TextView.android:text: How long does it take? 1- Whole Blood Donation: it takes about 10 minutes 2- Double red blood cells donation: it takes about 45 minutes 3- Platelets donation; donation 60 - 9- minutes depending on the height and eight of the donor, platelet count and Hematocrit level

How Often can I give blood? 1- Whole Blood Donation: every 8 weeks up to 6 times per year 2- Double red blood cells donation: every 16 weeks up to 3 times per year 3- Platelets donation: every 2 weeks up to 24 times per year
